languages.text: "Остается вам только позавидовать, Ваша Светлость. В атриуме вы найдете сотни людей, ожидающих суда, которые бы все отдали за порцию смертельного яда".

"You're in an enviable position, is all I can say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In the Atrium, you'll find hundreds of people who are awaiting trial and would give anything for a dose of lethal poison."
languages.original_text: "Остается вам только позавидовать, Ваша Светлость. В атриуме вы найдете сотни людей, ожидающих суда, которые бы все отдали за порцию смертельного яда".

traits.locale_text: "That's enviable, is all I can say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In the Atrium, you'll find hundreds of people who are awaiting trial and would give anything for a dose of lethal poison."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "That's enviable, is all I can say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In the Atrium, you'll find hundreds of people who are awaiting trial and would give anything for a dose of lethal poison."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "You're in an enviable position, is all I can say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In the Atrium, you'll find hundreds of people who are awaiting trial and would give anything for a dose of lethal poison."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "You're in an enviable position, is all I can say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In the Atrium, you'll find hundreds of people who are awaiting trial and would give anything for a dose of lethal poison."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “这可真让人羡慕，我也只能这么说了，大人。中庭那边有几百个人正在等待审判，只要能让他们喝上一杯这样的毒药，他们什么事情都愿意做。”
languages.original_text: "You're in an enviable position, is all I can say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In the Atrium, you'll find hundreds of people who are awaiting trial and would give anything for a dose of lethal poison."

traits.locale_text: “这可真让人羡慕，我也只能这么说了，大人。中庭那边有几百个人正在等待审判，只要能让他们喝上一杯这样的毒药，他们什么事情都愿意做。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「それは羨ましい限りですとしか言えません、陛下。アトリウムでは何百人もの人々が裁判を待っていて、致死量の毒を手に入れる為なら何でもするでしょうからね」
languages.original_text: "You're in an enviable position, is all I can say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In the Atrium, you'll find hundreds of people who are awaiting trial and would give anything for a dose of lethal poison."

traits.locale_text: 「それは羨ましい限りですとしか言えません、陛下。アトリウムでは何百人もの人々が裁判を待っていて、致死量の毒を手に入れる為なら何でもするでしょうからね」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «Su posición es envidiable, mi{mf|lord|lady}. En el Atrio encontrará cientos de personas que esperan juicio y que darían cualquier cosa por una dosis de veneno».
languages.original_text: "You're in an enviable position, is all I can say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In the Atrium, you'll find hundreds of people who are awaiting trial and would give anything for a dose of lethal poison."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es envidiable, mi{mf|lord|lady}. En el Atrio encontrará cientos de personas que esperan juicio y que darían cualquier cosa por una dosis de veneno».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Ihr seid in einer beneidenswerten Position, kann ich nur sagen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Im Atrium findet Ihr Hunderte von Menschen, die auf ihren Prozess warten und für eine Dosis tödliches Gift einfach alles tun würden."
languages.original_text: "You're in an enviable position, is all I can say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In the Atrium, you'll find hundreds of people who are awaiting trial and would give anything for a dose of lethal poison."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist beneidenswert, mehr kann ich nicht sagen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Im Atrium findet Ihr Hunderte von Menschen, die auf ihren Prozess warten und für eine Dosis tödliches Gift einfach alles tun würden."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Vous avez bien de la chance, Votre Seigneurie. À l'Atrium, vous trouverez des centaines de pauvres hères qui attendent d'être jugés et qui donneraient tout pour une dose de poison mortel. »
languages.original_text: "You're in an enviable position, is all I can say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In the Atrium, you'll find hundreds of people who are awaiting trial and would give anything for a dose of lethal poison."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez bien de la chance, Votre Seigneurie. À l'Atrium, vous trouverez des centaines de pauvres hères qui attendent d'être jugés et qui donneraient tout pour une dose de poison mortel. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, beni bağışlarsanız kıskanılacak bir konumda olduğunuzu söylemek isterim. Atriyum'da yargılanmayı bekleyen yüzlerce kişi var. Onlar için bu zehir, paha biçilmez bir şey."
languages.original_text: "You're in an enviable position, is all I can say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In the Atrium, you'll find hundreds of people who are awaiting trial and would give anything for a dose of lethal poison."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, beni bağışlarsanız kıskanılacak bir konumda olduğunuzu söylemek isterim. Atriyum'da yargılanmayı bekleyen yüzlerce kişi var. Onlar için bu zehir paha biçilmez bir şey."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
